item.jojo.breath_control_mask.hint: Halves the time needed to complete breath training exercises.
item.jojo.breath_control_mask.hint2: Requires the wearer to constantly perform Hamon Breath, otherwise breath stability starts decreasing.
item.jojo.gloves.hint: Let you use Hamon and vampirism moves which require empty hands.
item.jojo.tommy_gun.reference_quote: "I'll avenge uncle Speedwagon! This is a declaration of war!"
item.jojo.tommy_gun.reload_prompt: %s+%s to reload (consumes iron nuggets and gunpowder)
enchantment.jojo.virus_inhibition.desc: Decreases the virus damage dealt by an Arrow.
enchantment.jojo.stand_arrow_xp_reductio: Reduces the total amount of experience levels consumed by an Arrow.
item.jojo.stand_full_clear.hint: Also clears all the Stand abilities learned, and the Arrow xp cost penalty
item.jojo.walkman.reference_quote: "My own grandson doesn't even know my face! I'll never forgive the Japanese! But... I do like my Walkman."
item.jojo.cassette_blank.hint: Combine it with one or multiple music discs (in any combination) to record it
item.jojo.cassette_blank.hint.has_dyes: Combine it with one or multiple music discs/dyes (in any combination) to record it
jojo.stand_user_crafting.jei_hint.single: This can only be crafted if your Stand is %s
jojo.stand_user_crafting.jei_hint.multip: This can only be crafted if your Stand is either one of these:
advancements.jojo.root.title: JoJo
advancements.jojo.root.description: The start of a bizarre adventure... (Check the JoJo advancements tab)
advancements.jojo.hamon_temple.title: Foreigner... I See Your Future...
advancements.jojo.hamon_temple.descripti: Find a secluded Hamon temple high in the mountains
advancements.jojo.get_hamon.title: Breath Causes Ripples in Your Body...
advancements.jojo.hamon_mastery.title: The Wind Has Created a Viking!
advancements.jojo.hamon_mastery.descript: Get to the maximum levels of Hamon strength and Hamon control
advancements.jojo.last_hamon.title: It's My Last Hamon!
advancements.jojo.last_hamon.description: Receive another Hamon user's life energy
advancements.jojo.abandon_hamon.title: "Effort" is My Most Hated Word!
advancements.jojo.hamon_chicken.title: You Couldn't Even Beat That Chicken!
advancements.jojo.hamon_chicken.descript: Defeat another Hamon user... by charging a chicken
advancements.jojo.pillarman_temple.title: What is This Man in the Pillar?!
advancements.jojo.pillarman_temple.descr: Discover the ruins of a giant jungle temple
advancements.jojo.stone_mask.title: What's the Purpose of This Mask?
advancements.jojo.get_vampirism.title: I Reject My Humanity!
advancements.jojo.cure_vampirism.title: On Second Thought...
advancements.jojo.cure_vampirism.descrip: Cure from vampirism by eating an ENCHANTED golden apple under the Weakness effect of at least level 5
advancements.jojo.create_zombie.title: Become My Demon of the Night!
advancements.jojo.create_zombie.descript: Drain blood from a Villager or an Illager and turn them into a loyal Zombie
advancements.jojo.drain_humans.title: Do You Remember How Much Bread You've Eaten in Your Life?
advancements.jojo.vampire_kill_hamon.des: As a vampire, kill a Hamon user
advancements.jojo.coffin_sleep.title: I'm Allergic to Sunlight
advancements.jojo.coffin_sleep.descripti: Sleep in a coffin to skip over the day
advancements.jojo.vampire_hamon_damage_s: The Successor to 4000 Years of Hamon History
Being a vampire, reduce incoming Hamon damage by wearing a Satiporoja Scarf
advancements.jojo.meteorite.title: The Killer Virus Culls Lifeforms!
advancements.jojo.meteorite.description: Locate a meteorite impact site in a snowy biome
advancements.jojo.stand_arrow.title: The Arrow is Drawn to Capable
advancements.jojo.stand_arrow_shot.title: Show Me Your Stand Ability!
advancements.jojo.stand_arrow_shot.descr: Give someone else a Stand by shooting them with an Arrow
advancements.jojo.stand_lost_rps.title: Has Your Luck Left You?
advancements.jojo.stand_lost_rps.descrip: Lose a game of rock-paper-scissors... along with your Stand
advancements.jojo.get_stand.title: Possessed by an Evil Spirit
advancements.jojo.summon_stand.title: It's Finally Shown Itself!
advancements.jojo.summon_stand.descripti: Have your Stand power fully manifest
advancements.jojo.stand_kill_stand.title: My Stand Will Be the Judge!
advancements.jojo.resolve.title: My Resolve Shall Clear the Path!
advancements.jojo.resolve.description: Show your resolve by fighting with your Stand
advancements.jojo.stand_max.title: Now to Unleash My Stand's Power!
advancements.jojo.soul.title: This Trip Was Really Fun...
advancements.jojo.soul.description: Have your soul ascend after your death
advancements.jojo.time_ability.title: Power to Reign over the World!
advancements.jojo.time_ability.descripti: Bend the flow of time to your will by using a Stand ability
advancements.jojo.time_stop_9.title: This is the Greatest High!
advancements.jojo.destroy_stone_mask.tit: Now It's Over, Our Little Secret
advancements.jojo.destroy_stone_mask.des: Destroy a Stone Mask with a sledgehammer
advancements.jojo.no_stand_kill_stand.de: Defeat a Stand user without having a Stand
jojo.subtitle.luck_pluck_sword: "I'll slice you with the sword of Luck and Pluck!"
death.attack.ultraviolet.player: %s has dissipated under ultraviolet rays whilst fighting %s
death.attack.ultraviolet.entity: %s was destroyed by %s using ultraviolet rays
death.attack.ultraviolet.entity.item: %s was destroyed by %s using ultraviolet rays and %s
death.attack.mowzie_sun: %s was destroyed by the power of the sun
death.attack.mowzie_sun.player: %s was destroyed by the power of the sun whilst fighting %s
death.attack.mowzie_sun.entity: %s was destroyed by %s using the power of the sun
death.attack.mowzie_sun.entity.item: %s was destroyed by %s using the power of the sun via %s
death.attack.cold.entity.item: %s was frozen to death by %s using %s
death.attack.hamon.entity.item: %s was slain by %s using %s infused with Hamon
death.attack.pillarManAbsorption: %s was absorbed by a Pillar Man
death.attack.pillarManAbsorption.player: %s was absorbed by a Pillar Man whilst fighting %s
death.attack.standVirus: %s was exposed to a lethal virus
death.attack.standVirus.player: %s was exposed to a lethal virus whilst fighting %s
death.attack.standVirusMeteorite: %s caught a lethal virus through their injuries
death.attack.standVirusMeteorite.player: %s caught a lethal virus through their injuries
death.attack.roadRoller: %s was smashed flat as a pancake
death.attack.roadRoller.player: %s was smashed flat as a pancake whilst fighting %s
death.attack.eyeOfEnderShards: %s's insides were torn apart by an eye of ender shards
death.attack.eyeOfEnderShards.player: %s's insides were torn apart by an eye of ender shards
jojo.screen.edit_hud_layout.hint.mmb: Middle mouse button - quickly move to the quick access slot
jojo.chat.controls.message: You've got a JoJo power! Type %s to get a detailed guide on the mod's controls
jojo.chat.controls.tooltip: Click to paste the command to the chat
jojo.chat.command.controls.overlay: If you have a Stand power, pressing %s will switch Stand overlay UI; %s does the same for your other power (Vampirism/Hamon).
jojo.chat.command.controls.overlay.scrol: With an overlay on, you'll see two new hotbars for attacks and abilities available to you in this mode. While holding %s or %s, your 1-9 keys and mouse wheel can be used to choose an attack or ability respectively. Empty slots are for attacks/abilities which you haven't yet unlocked and therefore are skipped over.
jojo.chat.command.controls.overlay.use: You can perform the attack you have selected by pressing %1$s. Similarly, to use the selected ability, press %2$s. Performing an attack/ability will (in most cases) cancel vanilla attack/interaction.
jojo.chat.command.controls.stand: If you have a summonable Stand, press %s to summon/unsummon it. If the Stand you have summoned can be controlled manually (i.e. most of the Stands which take form of an entity), pressing %s will switch between normal mode and manual control mode, in which you can directly control your Stand's movements.
jojo.chat.command.controls.layout_edit: Pressing %s will open a window where you can swap and disable the individual attacks and abilities.
jojo.chat.command.controls.changeable:
The keys and control schemes can be changed in the game's controls options.
Have fun playing with your newly acquired powers!
jojo.chat.message.no_stand: You do not have a Stand
jojo.chat.message.no_stand.addon: No Stand %s found. You might have deleted an addon with that Stand.
jojo.chat.message.no_entity_stand: Your Stand can't be controlled remotely
jojo.chat.message.stand_not_enough_xp: You do not have enough experience to gain a Stand
jojo.chat.message.view_distance_stand: Careful! A Stand cannot be manually controlled beyond view distance
jojo.chat.message.no_hamon: You do not know how to use Hamon
jojo.chat.message.no_hamon_vampire: You have rejected your humanity and can't learn Hamon anymore
jojo.chat.message.no_hamon_abandoned: You have abandoned your Hamon training
jojo.chat.message.learnt_hamon: You may now start your Hamon training
jojo.chat.message.ask_hamon_teacher: Press %s to ask %s to teach you Hamon
jojo.chat.message.asked_hamon_teacher: You have asked %s to teach you Hamon
jojo.chat.message.new_hamon_learner: %s wants to start learning Hamon (press %s to start their training)
jojo.chat.message.hamon_window_hint: (Press %s or interact with a Hamon user to open Hamon skill window)
jojo.chat.message.cant_learn_hamon: You already have a power incompatible with Hamon
jojo.chat.message.stone_mask_peaceful: You can't turn into a vampire on Peaceful difficulty
jojo.command.desc.jojoconfigpack: Generates a data pack for editing Stand stats
jojo.command.desc.hamonstat: Sets a player's Hamon stat (Strength, Control or Breathing training)
jojo.command.desc.jojocontrols: The mod's HUD and controls tutorial
jojo.command.desc.jojoenergy: Checks or sets a player's non-Stand energy meter value
jojo.command.desc.jojopower: Gives or clears a player's non-Stand power
jojo.command.desc.stand: Gives, clears or retrieves the name of a player's Stand
jojo.command.desc.standlevel: Sets, adds or retrieves the Stand level value
jojo.command.desc.standdisc: Gives a Stand Disc item with a specific/random Stand
jojo.message.skip_soul_ascension: Press %s to skip the soul ascension
jojo.message.action_condition.no_energy_: Your breath has not yet stabilized
jojo.message.action_condition.no_stand_p: You do not control the Stand's main body
Your Stand is missing its arms
Your Stand is missing its legs
jojo.message.action_condition.peaceful: Monsters can't hurt anyone on Peaceful difficulty
jojo.message.action_condition.player_tar: You have to target a player with this ability
jojo.message.action_condition.blood: You can't satisfy your thirst with this creature
jojo.message.action_condition.fire: You can't do it while on fire
jojo.message.action_condition.ultrawarm: It's too hot in this place
jojo.message.action_condition.zombies_li: Too many zombies in the area
jojo.message.action_condition.cant_becom: The target can't become a vampire
jojo.message.action_condition.target_too: The target has too much health
jojo.message.action_condition.hand: This can only be performed with a free main hand
jojo.message.action_condition.hands: This can only be performed with both hands free
jojo.message.action_condition.animal_inf: You haven't learned a way to infuse entities with Hamon
jojo.message.action_condition.living_mob: Only living entities can be infused
jojo.message.action_condition.living_pla: Only blocks made of a living matter can be infused
jojo.message.action_condition.leaves: You need a block of leaves
jojo.message.action_condition.living_mob: Only living entities can be shocked
jojo.message.action_condition.already_ta: This animal is tamed by you
jojo.message.action_condition.potion: You need to hold a bottle with a liquid
jojo.config.keepStandOnDeath.tooltip: Whether or not players keep Stands after death.
jojo.config.keepHamonOnDeath.tooltip: Whether or not players keep Hamon and its stats after death.
jojo.config.keepVampirismOnDeath.tooltip: Whether or not players keep vampirism after death. The weak vampirism version from the 'Blood Gift' ability will not be kept.
jojo.config.dropStandDisc.tooltip: If enabled, Stand users drop their Stand's Disc upon death.
jojo.config.hamonTempleSpawn.tooltip: Whether or not Hamon Temple spawn in newly loaded chunks.
jojo.config.meteoriteSpawn.tooltip: Whether or not Meteorite Temple spawn in newly loaded chunks.
jojo.config.pillarManTempleSpawn.tooltip: Whether or not Pillar Man Temple spawn in newly loaded chunks.
jojo.config.hamonPointsMultiplier.toolti: Hamon Strength and Control levels growth multiplier.
jojo.config.breathingTrainingDeteriorati: Whether or not breathing training level deteriorates over time.
jojo.config.breathingStatGap.tooltip: The maximum difference between Hamon Strength/Control and Breathing training.
jojo.config.maxBloodMultiplier.tooltip: Max vampire energy multiplier on each difficulty level.
jojo.config.bloodDrainMultiplier.tooltip: Blood drain multiplier on each difficulty level.
jojo.config.bloodTickDown.tooltip: Vampire energy decrease per tick on each difficulty level.
jojo.config.bloodHealCost.tooltip: Vampire energy cost per 1 hp of healing on each difficulty level.
jojo.config.undeadMobsSunDamage.tooltip: Whether or not undead mobs take damage under the sun similarly to vampires.
jojo.config.vampiresAggroMobs.tooltip: Whether or not hostile mobs are agressive towards vampire players.
jojo.config.vampirismCuringDuration.tool: Duration of the vampirism curing process in ticks.
jojo.config.standXpCostInitial.tooltip: The initial cost of getting a Stand from a Stand Arrow (in experience levels).
jojo.config.standXpCostIncrease.tooltip: The increase of the cost for getting a Stand for each previous one the player has got before.
jojo.config.standRandomPoolFilter.toolti: Special rule limiting the pool of Stands randomly chosen from on multiplayer servers.
jojo.config.bannedStands.tooltip: List of Stands excluded from the pool used by Arrows, "/stand random" and "/standdisc random". The format is the same as for /stand give command (e.g., "jojo:star_platinum").
jojo.config.skipStandProgression.tooltip: Whether or not all of the abilities are unlocked after gaining a Stand in Survival.
jojo.config.resolveLvlPoints.tooltip: Max resolve points at each Resolve level (starting from 0).
jojo.config.standStamina.tooltip: Whether or not Stand stamina mechanic is enabled.
jojo.config.standDamageMultiplier.toolti: Damage multiplier applied to all Stands.
jojo.config.abilitiesBreakBlocks.tooltip: Whether or not Stands and abilities from the mod can break blocks.
jojo.config.hamonDamageMultiplier.toolti: Damage multiplier applied to all Hamon attacks.
jojo.config.hamonEnergyTicksDown.tooltip: Whether or not Hamon energy ticks down a few seconds after the user performs Hamon Breath.
jojo.config.timeStopChunkRange.tooltip: Range of Time Stop ability in chunks. If set to 0, the whole dimension is frozen in time.
jojo.config.timeStopDamageMultiplier.too: Damage multiplier for entities frozen in time.
jojo.options.client.title: Ripples of the Past client settings
jojo.config.client.barsPosition.tooltip: Position of Energy, Stamina and Resolve bars in the HUD.
jojo.config.client.hotbarsPosition.toolt: Position of Power name and action hotbars in the HUD.
jojo.config.client.hudNamesRender.toolti: How Power name and action names should render in the HUD.
jojo.config.client.hudHotbarsFold.toolti: Minimize HUD hotbars after an action is selected.
jojo.config.client.showModeSelector.tool: Whether or not a list of available Powers shows up when switching a HUD mode.
jojo.config.client.slotHotkeys.tooltip: Enable hotkey settings for each individual attack and ability from 1 to 9. Changing the setting requires restarting the game.
jojo.config.client.menacingParticles.too: Enable ゴゴゴゴゴ particles when AFK.
jojo.config.client.timeStopFreezesVisual: Enable particles, block texture animations and rain/snow being frozen during time stop. Crashes with Dynamic Surroundings mod.
jojo.config.client.timeStopAnimation.too: Enables the visual effect at the beginning of time stop when its duration is 5 seconds or longer.
jojo.config.client.characterVoiceLines.t: Whether or not voice lines of the JoJo characters whose powers the players use are played.

commands.jojoconfigpack.folder_link.tool: Click to open the data pack (inside the %s folder of this save).
commands.jojoconfigpack.standstats.all.f: Click to open the file path
commands.jojoconfigpack.standstats.singl: Click to open the file path

jojo.action.toast.title: New actions unlocked!
hamon_skill.toast.title: Learn a new Hamon skill!
hamon.intro.about.name: About Hamon
hamon.intro.about.text: In JJBA, Hamon is a form of energy produced by trained fighters via breathing. This energy has properties similar to sunlight's, making it fatal to zombies, vampires, and Pillar Men. In this mod it is one of the unique powers you can get.
hamon.intro.breath.name: Hamon Breath
hamon.intro.breath.text1: To use Hamon effectively, you have to manage your breath, represented by %s in the left upper corner.
hamon.intro.breath.text2: All the Hamon moves, like Overdrive, Healing, or any other ones you unlock, spend %s.
hamon.intro.breath.text3: Hamon energy is filled by using the special %s, bound to Middle Mouse Button by default.
hamon.intro.breath.text4: The translucent part of the bar is referred to as %s. If you do not refill Hamon energy, breath stability is used up instead. Spending it makes your Hamon weaker and lowers the energy cap for a little while.
hamon.intro.breath.text5: If you manage your Hamon energy well, you will not have to worry about that.
hamon.intro.stats_transition: With proper training you can become a stronger Hamon warrior. The next tab shows your Hamon stats and explains the training process.
hamon.breath_control_mask.restore_stab: Use Hamon Breath to breathe through the mask
hamon.strength_stat.desc: Determines the power of your Hamon attacks. Is trained by using Hamon attacks.
hamon.control_stat.desc: Determines the amount of Hamon energy spent and efficiency of your Hamon abilities. Is trained by using Hamon abilities.
hamon.stat_limited: The level won't increase unless you increase your breathing training level
hamon.breathing_stat.desc: You'll need to constantly train this stat in order to make progress in learning Hamon. It increases your breathing ability as well as your physical condition.
hamon.breathing_stat.desc2: To train your breathing, you have to complete these exercises daily. Complete at least 3 out of 4 of them each day for maximum results. It is also recommended to craft and wear a %s in the early stages of Hamon training.
hamon.breathing_stat.desc3: The training level will slowly decrease if you stop doing the exercises!
hamon.breathing_stat.desc4: You won't be able to increase your Hamon Strength/Hamon Control %s or more levels above the breathing training level.
hamon.training_bonus: Bonus %s points for previous consecutive training days
hamon.meditation_button: Click here to start meditating (stops if you move)
hamon.meditation_button.stability_hint: Meditating also helps restore breath stability faster
hamon.exercise.completion_buff_hint2: until the end of the day
hamon.exercise.full_completion_hint3: If you don't train the next day, your training level will not go down
hamon.next_point.strength: Next skill point at level %s Hamon strength
hamon.next_point.control: Next skill point at level %s Hamon control
hamon.unspent_points: You have unspent skill points, use them to learn new Hamon skills!
hamon.unspent_points_no_teacher: You have unspent skill points, visit a Hamon teacher to learn new Hamon skills from them!
hamon.technique_available: You have enough Hamon knowledge to learn a new technique skill!
hamon.strength_skills.tab.desc: Skills suited for direct combat: various ways of dealing Hamon damage or increasing your mobility. For each 5 levels of Hamon Strength you get a skill point to learn a skill from this tab.
hamon.control_skills.tab.desc: Hamon Abilities other than combat moves. Most of these are defensive capabilities or utility skills. For each 5 levels of Hamon Control you get a skill point to learn a skill from this tab.
hamon.techniques.tab.desc: Techniques are sets of skills specific to certain characters from parts 1 and 2 of JJBA. %sNew technique skills are unlocked at certain levels of both Hamon Strength and Hamon Control.
hamon.techniques.tab.desc.only_one: You can choose only one technique (a row of 3 skills).
hamon.technique_slot.locked: Will unlock at levels %s of Hamon Strength and Hamon Control
hamon.technique_slot.free: You can learn a new technique skill!
hamon.reset_creative_only: Reset skills from this tab (Creative only)
hamon.reset_tmp: Reset skills from this tab (temporarily enabled for Survival)
hamon.abandon.tab.desc: Do you really want to fully abandon your Hamon training?
hamon.closed.parents: You need to learn previous skills first!
hamon.closed.points: You don't have skill points for this!
hamon.techniques_locked: Technique skills will unlock at level %s of Hamon Strength and Hamon Control
hamon.closed.technique.locked: You can't learn a new technique skill yet!
hamon.closed.technique.max: You've reached maximum of technique skills!
hamon.closed.technique.bug: You can't learn a skill of another technique (if you for some reason can see this, it means this screen tab is bugged)
hamon.closed.teacher.required: You can only learn this from another Hamon user!
hamon.closed.teacher.no_skill: No one nearby you has learned this skill!
hamon.skills.overdrive.desc: The most basic application of Hamon. The user channels the Hamon energy through their fist, and deals damage either with a direct punch, or by transmitting the energy through a solid or liquid material.
hamon.skills.infusion.desc: Various materials can be imbued with Hamon energy. Living organisms can retain the energy for a longer time.
hamon.skills.flexibility.desc: Hamon can help its user exceed the limits of their movement capabilities and attack range.
hamon.skills.life.desc: Hamon energy can speed up the regeneration of a living body.
hamon.skills.attractant_repellent.desc: Attractant and repellent Hamon are two opposite types of Hamon energy, each having their special use cases.
hamon.skills.body_manipulation.desc: Hamon energy can affect organisms by vibrating the water inside their bodies.
hamonSkill.overdrive.name: Overdrive
hamonSkill.overdrive.desc: The user's unarmed punches deal additional Hamon damage. Hamon is especially effective against undead creatures.
hamonSkill.sendo_overdrive.name: Sendo Overdrive
hamonSkill.sendo_overdrive.desc: Applying this attack to a wall or floor creates a wave of Hamon energy, which damages mobs and players in the area.
hamonSkill.turquoise_blue_overdrive.name: Turquoise Blue Overdrive
hamonSkill.turquoise_blue_overdrive.desc: While underwater, the user can transfer a powerful wave of Hamon energy through water.
hamonSkill.sunlight_yellow_overdrive.des: The user channels all their energy into a slow, but powerful Sunlight Yellow Overdrive attack.
hamonSkill.throwables_infusion.name: Throwables Infusion
hamonSkill.throwables_infusion.desc: Snowballs, eggs and splash water bottles the user throws inflict additional Hamon damage.
hamonSkill.plant_infusion.name: Plants Infusion (block)
hamonSkill.plant_infusion.desc: The user temporarily charges a block of a plant with Hamon. While it's charged, mobs and players will take Hamon damage upon touching it.
hamonSkill.animal_infusion.name: Living Organism Infusion
hamonSkill.animal_infusion.desc: Allows the user to charge living mobs and players with Hamon.
hamonSkill.plant_item_infusion.name: Plants Infusion (item)
hamonSkill.plant_item_infusion.desc: When throwing out a plant, the user charges it with Hamon. Mobs and players getting too close to it will take Hamon damage.
hamonSkill.arrow_infusion.name: Arrow Infusion
hamonSkill.arrow_infusion.desc: Arrows and tridents the user shoots inflict additional Hamon damage.
hamonSkill.zoom_punch.name: Zoom Punch
hamonSkill.zoom_punch.desc: Extends the user's arm, allowing them to punch an enemy from longer distance, additionally dealing Hamon damage.
hamonSkill.jump.name: Leap
hamonSkill.jump.desc: Allows the user to leap forward by jumping while sneaking.
hamonSkill.speed_boost.name: Speed Boost
hamonSkill.speed_boost.desc: Gives the user Speed and Haste effects for a short amount of time.
hamonSkill.afterimages.name: Body Control Mastery
hamonSkill.afterimages.desc: Speed Boost ability gives stronger effects. Leap's strength is increased. Maximum speed boost summons the user's afterimages.
hamonSkill.healing.name: Healing
hamonSkill.healing_touch.name: Healing Touch
hamonSkill.healing_touch.desc: Allows the user to heal others with Healing ability while sneaking.
hamonSkill.plants_growth.name: Plants Growth
hamonSkill.plants_growth.desc: The Healing ability can apply bone meal effect.
hamonSkill.expel_venom.name: Expel Venom
hamonSkill.expel_venom.desc: The user's Healing ability also removes Poison, Hunger, Wither and Nausea effects.
hamonSkill.wall_climbing.name: Wall Climbing
hamonSkill.wall_climbing.desc: Lets the user adhere to a vertical surface and climb it.
hamonSkill.liquid_walking.name: Liquid Walking
hamonSkill.liquid_walking.desc: Allows the user to freely walk on a liquid surface. Press double Shift to disable.
hamonSkill.life_magnetism.name: Life Magnetism
hamonSkill.life_magnetism.desc: Turns a block of leaves into a hang glider. If not continuously charged with Hamon energy, the glider will disintegrate.
hamonSkill.projectile_shield.name: Projectile Barrier
hamonSkill.projectile_shield.desc: Creates a projectile reflecting barrier in front of the user.
hamonSkill.protection.name: Hamon Protection
hamonSkill.protection.desc: Creates a Hamon-charged coating on the surface of the user's body, reducing the incoming physical damage.
hamonSkill.detector.name: Detector
hamonSkill.detector.desc: Gives entities around the user Glowing effect.
hamonSkill.hypnosis.name: Animal Hypnosis
hamonSkill.hypnosis.desc: The user temporarily tames a tameable animal.
hamonSkill.hamon_shock.name: Hamon Shock
hamonSkill.hamon_shock.desc: The user applies a Hamon charge directly to a living creature's head, incapacitating them for a short time.
hamonSkill.hamon_spread.name: Hamon Spread
hamonSkill.hamon_spread.desc: Whenever the user attack an undead with Hamon, it continues spreading through the target's body, weakening it and slowing down its regeneration.
hamonSkill.natural_talent.name: Natural Talent
hamonSkill.scarlet_overdrive.name: Scarlet Overdrive
hamonSkill.scarlet_overdrive.desc: A special type of Overdrive attack, which deals additional damage and sets the target on fire.
hamonSkill.metal_silver_overdrive.name: Metal Silver Overdrive
hamonSkill.metal_silver_overdrive.desc: You can perform Overdrive attack with a weapon or a tool.
hamonSkill.overdrive_barrage.name: Overdrive Barrage
hamonSkill.overdrive_barrage.desc: You unleash a barrage of rapid Overdrive attacks.
hamonSkill.hamon_cutter.name: Hamon Cutter
hamonSkill.hamon_cutter.desc: Infuse a bottle of liquid with Hamon and shoot the liquid out at high speed. In addition to Hamon damage, the potion's effect is applied to the target.
hamonSkill.sendo_wave_kick.name: Sendo Wave Kick
hamonSkill.sendo_wave_kick.desc: You charge forward, hitting all enemies on your way with your knee, additionally dealing Hamon damage to them.
hamonSkill.tornado_overdrive.name: Tornado Overdrive
hamonSkill.tornado_overdrive.desc: By spinning at high speed, you deal Hamon damage to the enemies around you. This attack is especially deadly while falling.
hamonSkill.deep_pass.name: Deep Pass Overdrive
hamonSkill.deep_pass.desc: When you die, you transfer all of your life energy (Hamon Strength and Control levels) to a nearby Hamon User.
hamonSkill.clacker_volley.name: Clacker Volley
hamonSkill.clacker_volley.desc: Allows you to use a pair of clackers as a Hamon-infused melee weapon or charge and throw it at the opponent at high speed.
hamonSkill.rope_trap.name: Rope Trap
hamonSkill.rope_trap.desc: Right-clicking a string temporarily turns connected strings into a Hamon-charged cobweb. While sneaking, you automatically place a string from your hotbar.
hamonSkill.cheat_death.name: Cheat Death
hamonSkill.cheat_death.desc:
When you are about to die, you will avoid death and gain Invisibility effect (once an in-game day).
Your next words: "What does it have to do with Hamon?"
hamonSkill.bubble_launcher.name: Bubble Launcher
hamonSkill.bubble_launcher.desc: Shoot a barrage of Hamon-charged bubbles.
hamonSkill.bubble_cutter.name: Bubble Cutter
hamonSkill.bubble_cutter.desc: Shoot out disc-shaped bubbles, which move at a high velocity. Gliding variation bubbles are more precise and, instead of hitting the ground, continue to glide above it.
hamonSkill.bubble_barrier.name: Bubble Barrier
hamonSkill.bubble_barrier.desc: Shoot a large-sized bubble, which traps its target for a few seconds.
hamonSkill.crimson_bubble.name: Crimson Bubble
hamonSkill.crimson_bubble.desc: When you die, you put your life energy (Hamon Strength and Control levels) into a bubble, from which it can be transferred to another Hamon user.
hamonSkill.aja_stone_keeper.name: Keeper of Aja Stone
hamonSkill.aja_stone_keeper.desc: You can instantly charge an Aja Stone with Hamon. When using a regular Aja Stone, you have a small chance to turn it into Super Aja.
hamonSkill.satiporoja_scarf.name: Satiporoja Beetle Scarf
hamonSkill.satiporoja_scarf.desc: You get a scarf which, when worn, reduces Hamon energy spent and absorbs Hamon damage. You can use it as a Hamon-conductive melee weapon or swing it to cover a larger area of targets.
hamonSkill.snake_muffler.name: Snake Muffler
hamonSkill.snake_muffler.desc: When getting attacked while wearing the scarf, you jump over the attacker using the scarf and deal Hamon damage to them (has a cooldown). Attacking with the scarf while sneaking ensnares the target.
jojo.vampire.ready_to_cure: You feel sleepy. Maybe sleeping a bit will finish this nightmare...
jojo.stand_ui.name: Stand Info (WIP)
jojo.arrow.stand_arrow_xp: Spend %s levels to have a higher chance at surviving
jojo.arrow.stands_hint: %s to see the list of available Stands
jojo.arrow.least_taken_mode: Gives a Stand less players on the server have
jojo.arrow.not_taken_mode: Gives a Stand no other player on the server has
jojo.message.action_condition.chariot_ra: Silver Chariot is missing the rapier
jojo.message.action_condition.chariot_ar: Silver Chariot already has no armor
jojo.message.action_condition.block_offh: You need to hold a block in your off-hand
jojo.message.action_condition.item_hard_: You need a block made of a hard material
jojo.message.action_condition.stand_cant: Your Stand can't break this block
jojo.message.action_condition.item_offha: You need to hold the item in your off-hand
jojo.message.action_condition.item_block: You need an anchor block in your off-hand
jojo.rps.game_invite.text: %s wants to play rock-paper-scissors with you! Type %s to accept
